page.title: 07Capel St Mary Primary School
page.content: Capel St Mary Church of England Voluntary Controlled Primary School holds 431 children and has 25 staff including teachers,cooks,cleaners and ancilliary helper Mr Bishop has been headmaster for nearly 4 years.He and all the staff are paid by the Suffolk C.C. We have school dinners, Mrs> Cooper is the head of the cooks. Mrs. Cooper has four helpers in the kitchen. Mr.Boyle the caretaker has worked here for eight years. He works thirty nine hours a week and has two helpers. He gets his equipment from the Suffolk C.C. After 3.30p.m.school is used for evening classes, Keep Fit, Drama,Art, Church Clubs,Brownies,Guides,Yoga, Needlework and Holiday Club. Capel School has been extended twice in 1968 and in 1970.Parents help school by Fundraising to buy some equipment.
